scripts.build:dev:win32: yarn powershell mvn clean install `-DskipTests `-DskipITs `-Pno-showcase && pnpm dist
scripts.build:prod:linux:darwin: pnpm lint && mvn clean install -DskipTests=$(build-env global.build.test --not) -DskipITs -Pno-showcase && pnpm dist
scripts.build:prod:win32: pnpm lint && yarn powershell mvn clean install `-DskipTests=$(build-env global.build.test --not) `-DskipITs `-Pno-showcase && pnpm dist
scripts.dist: rimraf dist && mkdir dist && pnpm dist:sw
